text: Taradale is a suburb of Napier city in the Hawke's Bay, New Zealand. It has a shopping centre, several schools and churches. It had a town board and borough council until it was merged with Napier City Council in 1968. It has one of the finest vineyards in New Zealand. ==References== Category:Hawke's Bay Category:Napier, New Zealand
title: Taradale, New Zealand
